attributes.action: Teach More Transferable Life Skills Such As How To Do Taxes In School
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to try and get secondary schools to teach children more life skills that they would be able to use in adult life as it has occurred to me that many have no idea how to do important things such as working out there taxes. I would like to propose introducing a class in schools on how to do these necessary tasks for example how to vote or how to balance their expenditure and income.
